headline: Lennox International (LII): Is the Recent Share Price Drop an Opportunity or a Warning for Valuation?
summary: Lennox International (LII) shares have struggled over the past month, slipping about 6%, with declines deepening over the past three months and year. Investors are watching company performance and broader market factors for clues on what’s next. See our latest analysis for Lennox International. After a remarkable multi-year run, Lennox International’s momentum has cooled, with its share price giving up over 6% in the past month and trailing further year-to-date.
